On the other hand, if you prefer a more romantic and mysterious tale, 'Restless' (2006) with Mia Wasikowska and Hayley Atwell might be up your alley. Enjoy the chills!

Based on your preference for gothic films with intriguing plots, I'd highly recommend "The Right Stuff" (1983). This film follows the U.S. space program's development from breaking the sound barrier to the selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts. It stars notable actors like Ed Harris and Sam Shepard.

Another option is "Paycheck" (2003), where an engineer's ingenious plan goes awry, leaving him on the run and trying to unravel the mystery behind his predicament. This film features Ben Affleck in a thrilling performance. Enjoy your movie time!
